mapper.update: UPDATE PET_ITEM_REVIEW SET REVIEW_SUBJECT = #{REVIEW_SUBJECT}, REVIEW_CONTENT = #{REVIEW_CONTENT}, REVIEW_IMG = #{REVIEW_IMG}, REVIEW_STAR = #{REVIEW_STAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PET_ITEM_REVIEW (REVIEW_NO, ITEM_NO, REVIEW_SUBJECT, REVIEW_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID, REVIEW_IMG, REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_DATE) values(REVIEW_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ITEM_NO}, #{REVIEW_SUBJECT}, #{REVIEW_CONTENT}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{REVIEW_IMG}, #{REVIEW_STAR}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from PET_ITEM_REVIEW where ITEM_NO = #{ITEM_NO}

SELECT REVIEW_NO , ITEM_NO , REVIEW_SUBJECT , REVIEW_CONTENT , MEMBER_ID , REVIEW_IMG , REVIEW_STAR , REVIEW_DATE, row_number() over (order by REVIEW_NO desc) as rnum FROM PET_ITEM_REVIEW WHERE ITEM_NO = #{ITEM_NO} order by review_no
